column2: Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach (Deputy Joe McHugh)
column5: I move:That Dáil Éireann, under section 8 of the Houses of the Oireachtas Commission Act 2003, as amended, appoints Deputy Marcella Corcoran Kennedy to be an ordinary member of the Houses of the Oireachtas Commission in place of Deputy Joe Carey who has resigned his office in accordance with the aforementioned section 8.
